translations: 代表作，杰作；极好的例证；手艺人为取得大师资格并进入行会而制作的作品

sentences.sentence: The work was acclaimed as a masterpiece.
The painting is a masterpiece in the truest sense of the word.
sentences.translation: 这幅画是名副其实的杰作。

sentences.sentence: The play was built up to be a masterpiece but I found it very disappointing.
sentences.translation: 那部戏被捧为杰作，可我却大失所望。
